website_summaries.verdict: Highly concentrated scent, natural ingredients, and top burn performance makes this a great gift or spiritual accent piece.
pros: Your choice of 3 rich, aromatherapeutic scents/designs and clean, long burning time for its size – up to 80 hr
A nice addition to a meditation room, spa, bedroom, or yoga studio
cons: Pricey for a candle of this size

customer_reviews.title: Excellence in a candle
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago, I discovered One Soul candles, buying the Moroccan Amber candle. I fell in love with it pretty much immediately. A few weeks ago, I came across the lavender and bergamot candle. I got 2, and presented one as a gift to a friend (by the way, she loved it). I hadn't lit mine until now. Wow. The subtle smell is so relaxing and elegant that I'm very tempted to leave it on all the time. In summary, I highly recommend this candle to everybody, perfect gift, incredible for meditating and to give that touch (smell) of luxury to your home.
customer_reviews.author: Brujina

customer_reviews.title: Normal candle
customer_reviews.text: I am baffled at all the reviews that make this candle seem out of this world. The packaging is sophisticated but the scent is light and not long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it smell amazing, but it’s gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sandalwood orchid candle and it surpassed my expectations. Not only does it smell amazing, but it’s gorgeous. I received multiple messages from the company, checking to make sure everything was perfect with my order. I am very impressed with the candle and the customer service and I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Txrdr

customer_reviews.title: no throw
customer_reviews.text: Well for a candle freak, this one was not impressive, I love the artwork and the presentation but there isn't any throw to the fragrance, Im not sure if I got a bad batch or what but there is not fragrance at all, just a pretty burning candle.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PURE SCENT
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a wonderful pure scent that travels through the whole house spreading a calming feeling for all to enjoy. The box it is packed in shows the extra attention given to this product. Beautiful and ready to gift, but I am keeping mine! Add this candle to your collection to bring out for a special event or for your own pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t sure if this candle was worth the money but after burning it almost nonstop since it came in, I am very happy with this purchase. It smells clean, burns clean and burns slowly. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: some people might enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle after a trip to Morocco several years ago, thinking that it would smell like the amber that I purchased there. While the candle itself is beautiful, it does not smell like Moroccan amber, in my opinion; it is much, much sweeter, lacking the spicier undertones that make Moroccan amber a subtle scent. I'm sure that many people would really enjoy the smell but it reminded me too much of birthday cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: The scent was not as strong as I would have liked but g/f said it was nice and she liked it. It looks very nice and at the rate it burned, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly scent
customer_reviews.text: The wild orchid & sandalwood scent is one of the most beautiful scents I've ever smelled. The candle burn slow and lasts a long time. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieS1

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this candle!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sandalwood candle but some sandalwood scents can smell a little musky or smokey but I was looking for a sweeter scented candle. This scent is perfect. It smells amazing and burns well. Not too floral at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: An excellent smell and presentation. The packaging however, appeared to have been put together in error. We live in Australia, so had posted to My US in order to transit. The box may have been undone and then put back together incorrectly, making it a disappointing un-boxing experience. Gorgeous product though.
customer_reviews.author: Refined State

customer_reviews.title: The smell is great!
customer_reviews.text: The candle lasts a long time and the smell is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A great gift. Buy it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! The box is nice. The material is sturdy. And it smells amazing. Dont hesitate buying this!
customer_reviews.author: I read too much

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed this candle and it is great looking also
customer_reviews.text: Grear scent and throw. I have really enjoyed this candle and it is great looking also.
customer_reviews.author: aundrey salter

customer_reviews.title: Should not be advertised as fragrant
customer_reviews.text: No fragrance whatsoever. Lit it twice each time for 1 hour still no scent
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Best Candle Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle it doesn't burn too fast which is great...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived yesterday and in perfect condition. I absolutely love the scent and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived yesterday and in perfect condition. I absolutely love the scent and it goes perfectly in the little boho room I’ve created in my house. I’m sure I will purchase again when this one burns out Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This candle was a gift for my close friend, she just loves it and told me it smells wonderful, thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Elizabeth Kuller

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Came without a box , not as described with a dent on the top cover wrapped in bubble wrapping. Also had an amateur sticker of the hamsa that my 2 year old would make. Smells terrible, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift and Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the second candle I bought, and am just as impressed as I was with the first. These candles are super high quality, and the designs are intricate and carefully picked to match the smell. It's really incredible how much they stand out. Most importantly, the smell is just as high quality and long-lasting as the materials it's made in. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Yossef

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this candle not knowing what to expect. I love the quality!!! I love the aroma it leaves. This candle is a perfect gift for anyone anytime.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Our second order. Great scent and amazing coverage. Last forever.
customer_reviews.author: AlanTodd

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and cool design.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design / presentation of the candle. Good balanced scent. Not too overwhelming but not too light either. Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Todd and Sylvia Sorg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully strong scented candle!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully strong scented candle. A definite purchase you will enjoy! Would also make an awesome gift for any occasion. Awesome graphic on glass as well!
customer_reviews.author: al g.

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle! I love the fragrance, which last even after you put it out the candle leaving a nice aroma in the room for a while. The presentation is beautiful, a very nice gift for candle lovers! Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: The smell of my new candle started to fill the ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell of my new candle started to fill the room before I even lit it. When lit the scent filled 2 rooms in the matter of an hour. It is a quality candle.
customer_reviews.author: E.F.

customer_reviews.title: Great items! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived safely and in EX condition .Great items! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kazuko  Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Love this candles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this candles they are amazing !! I really recommend them. ✨🙌🏻💕
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Terrific candle !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my candle and the professional service I received. The fragrance - Moroccan Amber is wonderful in my home!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sherry Manburg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the candle!
customer_reviews.text: Loving our candle - looks great, smells amazing, burns well. Will definitely order again for our home and as a gift to others.
customer_reviews.author: david alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. Lasts even longer than 80 hours, smells amazing and it is beautiful! Exceeded my expectations by far. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Lach

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent. 💖
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! High quality and wonderful for ambient meditation.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Neher

customer_reviews.title: An awesome product, very nice package
customer_reviews.text: An awesome product, very nice package, and slowly and well burning candle filling the space with relaxing, very fresh smelling Aroma. Great idea to send as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order. We love these candles. They last forever and smell great.
customer_reviews.author: AlanTodd

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fragrance and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely smelling candle. I use it during my meditations and it was a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing candle.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smelling candle. When it burns down the Om glows and it's very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lia M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing candle. The scent is wonderful and it comes in a nicely packaged box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Divine scent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely divine scent. The wick is very good at keeping the flame going, the aroma of the candle even lingers much longer after it is extinguished. You can tell with this candle the difference between the organic aroma of the lavender and other essential oils and the artificial ones found in other candles. Will buy again and worth the price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Candle
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best smelling and burning candles I have purchased. Highly recommend this brand. I will be purchasing more of this scent (Moroccan Amber) and trying other scents.
customer_reviews.author: SassySis

customer_reviews.title: Subtle, yet pervasive and pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent and that it is subtle and disperses throughout the room. In fact, even the guys who tend not to notice or comment about such things complimented me on the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Clarise Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best candle I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best Smelling candle that I've ever owned. My only problem with it Is that the wick came way too short so I needed to dig around it in order to make sure it stays lit.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candle - so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This candle was just what I hoped it would be. The smell was not too overpowering, it was soft and aided in relaxation. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product; excellent packaging for gift or whatever.
customer_reviews.text: Personal use in home. I thought the aroma was.... hmm, how to describe it.... deep, hot, sensual. All at the party made note of it. Love it or hate it. We loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible scent
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended as Amazons best candle on a gift list. Worst fragrance ever! Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: karen Piacenta

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived on time and fully intact (well wrapped). They smelled very good and the people to whom we gave them are quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The beautifully packaged Moroccan Amber candle arrived sooner than expected. The scent is exquisite! Thank you, One Soul.
customer_reviews.author: Shirleyanne43

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best candles I have ever purchased....and I have purchased many. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks new not used
customer_reviews.text: Candle came messed up, and smelled horrible, Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely  scent
customer_reviews.text: I would not order if I did not like the candles. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Berkman

customer_reviews.title: My Wife LOVES it. Need I say more? ...
customer_reviews.text: My Wife LOVES it. Need I say more? 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JJOSH81

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is awesome, a word I think is over used so I seldom use it. The aroma is beautiful. I have used it now 6 or 7 times for about 20 hours in total and its only a quarter used up. It,s really false economy buying cheaper candles that last only a few hours. I WILL buy more.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not worth the money for this candle. I will not buy it again,
customer_reviews.author: Arianda

product_meta.title: OneSoul Aromatherapy Candles (Moroccan Amber, 14oz)
product_meta.description: Each candle is hand poured using eco-friendly palm blend wax and the finest fragrances available. OneSoul Candles are known for their superior ability to fill a room with a wonderful aroma in minutes. The designs are symbols that unite different spiritual paths into one universal flame. Each candle is infused with different types of positive energy ranging from Reiki to Kabbalistic meditations. By lighting these candles our intention is enhance your space by connecting to more love and unity, hence OneSoul. Our commitment to the environment has lead us to develop our candles which are clean burning, long lasting, with a superior fragrance throw and reusable glass and packaging. We are family owned business and our candles are proudly made in the Americas.
feature_bullets: SMALL BATCH HAND POURED CANDLE: Each candle is hand poured in small batches, using eco-friendly palm blend wax. Lead-free, cotton wicks provide a high quality, clean and soot free burning experience. The 3 wick candle is 14oz with an approximate burn time 50 hours.

PREMIUM FRAGRANCE: Moroccan Amber is a soothing and refreshing blend of sweet with a touch of earth tone. Our candles are known for their superior ability to fill a room with a wonderful aroma in minutes with the finest fragrances available. Moroccan Amber helps create feelings of serenity and calmness and at the same time up lifting which helps alleviate stress and aids in relaxation.

SPIRITUAL DESIGN: The Hamsa is an ancient symbol of strength, power and protection. This Sacred Geometry encompasses cre. Re-purpose the glass after use to continue to enjoy its beauty. We stand behind the quality of our products with a 100% Satisfaction Money Back Guarantee.

THE ORIGINAL UNIQUE GIFT CANDLE: Don’t be fooled by imitators on Amazon - OneSoul Candles is the original brand you can trust. As the spiritual luxury candle pioneer, we make customer happiness our #1 priority. Ideal for yourself or a gift for someone special. Ideal for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Anniversaries, birthdays and even Father's Day!

OUR ETHICAL FAMILY COMMITMENT: Proudly made in the Americas using socially responsible practices, locally and domestically sourced and sustainable ingredients and eco-friendly and recyclable packaging. 100% Money Back Guarantee! If you don't love our Moroccan Amber, let us know and receive a full, no questions asked refund. We are a small family owned business of committed to making great products that are safe for you and the planet!
